content.question: A country has a birth rate of <math alttext="35 per 1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>35</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> individuals and a death rate of <math alttext="13 per 1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>13</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> individuals. The death rate was <math alttext="37 per 1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>37</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> individuals in 1950, <math alttext="28 per 1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>28</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> individuals in 1970, and <math alttext="21 per 1,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>21</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>000</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> individuals in 1990. Which of the following statements best explains why the country has a declining death rate?

choices.label: The country is in stage 1 of the demographic transition, and infant mortality is high because of poor health services and high levels of poverty.
The country is in stage 2 of the demographic transition, and life expectancy has increased because of improvements in public health, sanitation, and access to food.
The country is in stage 3 of the demographic transition, and more women are entering the workforce and shifting to having children later in life.
The country is in stage 4 of the demographic transition, and the population growth rate is declining.

content.answer: The country is in stage 2 of the demographic transition, and life expectancy has increased because of improvements in public health, sanitation, and access to food.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
